data: “My heart chokes in me like in a prison! I’m dying for a little love and I got nobody—nobody!” wailed Shenah Pessah, as she looked out of the dismal basement window.
"My heart chokes in me like in a prison! I'm dying for a little love and I got nobody--nobody!" wailed Shenah Pessah, as she looked out of the dismal basement window.
